projects.title: Pong
projects.description: Pong is a timeless classic in the world of arcade games, and this project brings the iconic game back to life using vanilla CSS, HTML, and JavaScript. It's a modern take on the original Pong game, offering a nostalgic gaming experience for users of all ages.

projects.title: PetPals
projects.description: Developed a community-driven pet adoption platform where users can view, comment, and inquire about pets available for adoption in the shelter. Leveraged React for the front-end development and utilized Django, Python, and PostgreSQL for crafting a robust backend. Integrated user authentication to allow account creation, adding favorite pets to personal lists, and contacting the shelter about pet adoptions. Demonstrated proficient use of full-stack development skills to create a user-friendly and feature-rich platform.

projects.title: DrinkLink
projects.description: Developed a sophisticated drinks application with functionalities to search and store favorite cocktail and non-alcoholic beverage recipes. Utilized MERN stack, Sass, and Auth0 for development; hosted live with Netlify and Heroku.
